name: Resident Inhuman
description:
The year is 2025. You are Kai(PH), leader of Sol Incorporated. You and your company are at the forefront of technology, computers, and everything artificial intelligence based. However, with rising concerns over the practical use of AI, you are now tasked with making a new supercomputer AI to show the world just what artificial intelligence can become. But tread carefully, for this is no easy task and can backfire horribly.

Created by Epic Gamer Team of University of Utah for Alternative Game Development. Made by Daniel Kaufman, Htet Naing, Landon Beaty, Andrew Tan, and Gabe Hanson.
